name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control
display_help: You can control the essence of fire to entrap, scorch, and manipulate your foes with smoke and flame.

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Ring_of_Fire
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Rings to Immobilize. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 6.73 fire damage over 9.2s on target
4.0 immobilize for 27.94s on target
5 ticks of 6.73 fire damage over 9.2s on target
Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

5.0 immobilize for 4s on target

Unresistable

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Soot
powers.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring them with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 3.0 hold for 22.35s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Fire_Cages
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Smoke
powers.display_help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: -90.00% perception radius for 1m 0s on target
-5.00% to hit for 1m 0s on target
-5.00% to hit for 20s on target
-90.00% perception radius for 20s on target

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Hot_Feet
powers.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Flashfire
powers.display_help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Disorient

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Cinders
powers.display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Bonfire
powers.display_help: You can create a Bonfire that knocks back and burns any foes who try to pass through it. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Knockback

powers.name: Controller_Control.Fire_Control.Fire_Imps
powers.display_help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Long
